thread.title: Surge in cases of deadly but preventable diseases among elderly

author: John Bingham
title: Surge in cases of deadly but preventable diseases among elderly
text: Elder Health Surge in cases of deadly but preventable diseases among elderly Age UK study warns ageing population, care cuts and NHS pressures creating ‘destructive vicious circle’ as one million are left to fend for themselves Pneumonia seen in one of the lungs. Photo: ALAMY By John Bingham , Social Affairs Editor 7:00AM BST 21 Oct 2015
